tips.title: Overspent ELECTRONICS budget
tips.body: You’re at ~559% of your ELECTRONICS budget for 2025-11. Consider pausing non-essentials in this category or raising next month’s budget.

tips.title: Track to “Emergency Fund”
tips.body: To hit **Emergency Fund** by 2026-11-07, set an auto-contribution of ~15/week or 61/month.

tips.title: Set a TRAVEL budget
tips.body: You spent about 4917.2 in TRAVEL this month. A starter budget for next month could be ~5450.

narrative: Privacy-aware suggestions for 2025-11: ELECTRONICS, goal, TRAVEL.
